quotes.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
Our sweat is answer to all those who question our effort and hard work.
I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn't know.
At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want.
A solid answer to everything is not necessary. Blurry concepts influence one to focus, but postulated clarity influences arrogance.
The reason I talk to myself is that I'm the only one whose answers I accept.
The great question that has never been answered, and which I have not yet been able to answer, despite my thirty years of research into the feminine soul, is 'What does a woman want?
The greatest compliment that was ever paid me was when one asked me what I thought, and attended to my answer.
Education is not the answer to the question. Education is the means to the answer to all questions.
Charm is a way of getting the answer 'Yes' without asking a clear question.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
It ain't what they call you, it's what you answer to.
Historians are like deaf people who go on answering questions that no one has asked them.
A thinker sees his own actions as experiments and questions--as attempts to find out something. Success and failure are for him answers above all.
It is better to know some of the questions than all of the answers.
Never answer a critic, unless he's right.
Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers.
I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.
To get answers, ask questions; but to get good answers, ask good questions.
Live your questions now, and perhaps even without knowing it, you will live along some distant day into your answers.
There are always answers...We just fail to notice them.
He who asks questions, cannot avoid the answers
I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer.
A wise man's question contains half the answer.
Life is made up of constant calls to action, and we seldom have time for more than hastily contrived answers.
It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
Man is a question; woman is an answer. The mistake women make today is to offer themselves as answers before being questioned.

You're like a wrong answer to the unpredictable question. Busy asking for certainty, you're like the wrong answer to which I am compelled to attempt, knowing that it won't be correct hoping to score full marks.
Our desires always disappoint us; for though we meet with something that gives us satisfaction, yet it never thoroughly answers our expectation.
